item.title: Introduction to Python Programming
item.description: Python is a popular, high-level programming language known for its simplicity, readability, and versatility. It is often used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and scientific computing.

item.title: Working With Python List Data
item.description: Working With Python List Data. Data is everywhere. Programming is all about data, processing data, acquiring data, understanding data.
